concept.title: Images

conbody.p: To add images to my document, I created a ditamp called "Glossary-keyrefs". I then added a keydef for each images and used hrefs to point the ditamap to my images folder with my project folder structure. In the document, to add an image I added an image tag then used the keyref attribute to point to the image. I also applied a width of 750 to keep the images a uniform size.
